function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased air exchange rate may lead to higher energy consumption in the building.","Impact":"Higher energy consumption may result in increased costs and environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient HVAC systems and building design to minimize energy consumption while maintaining high air exchange rates.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, smart building automation systems, passive design strategies for ventilation.","People":"Building owners, facility managers, energy consultants, HVAC engineers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, energy consultants, architects, HVAC engineers."},{"Description":"Higher air exchange rate may lead to decreased risk of virus transmission and infection.","Impact":"Decreased risk of virus transmission can result in a healthier indoor environment and reduced likelihood of outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of HVAC systems, use of air purifiers and filtration systems, and adherence to ventilation standards and guidelines.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, high-efficiency air filters, UV germicidal lamps, ventilation monitoring systems.","People":"Building occupants, public health officials, facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health officials."}]}
